title: Nasty bully words on the boards lately.

embed.description: reword is the red line to help end online bullying. It needs your support. Learn more and install it yourself http://reword.it

body:
Here you go guys, use this tool and stop being meany-heads.

My feelings are really hurt right now. I think this tool will really help bring up the spirit on the boards.

replies.body: lmao fuck off glycerine, man up you pansy buttmunch

> [{quoted}](name=A steezy Scizor,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ABHGNi3v,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-04-18T01:37:21.912+0000)
>
> lmao fuck off glycerine, man up you pansy buttmunch

lmao

You realize, just because it puts a line through what i'm saying doesn't mean i can't say it.

A better thing would be to do this, but on the receiving end of those who can't take profanity, and instantly the problem is fixed because you can't read it.

Like the mute system in league.
I wonder if that site allows me me to reword everything into various profanity.

> [{quoted}](name=Annie Bots Wife,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ABHGNi3v,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-17T07:40:33.680+0000)
>
> I wonder if that site allows me me to reword everything into various profanity.

Me too.
